reviewText: Yes! All of our kids loved this! :)  It's charming!  It's simple, it's lovely!  Glad we got this one for sure! :)
Title: The Littlest Light on the Christmas Tree

reviewText: Watched this movie with my grandkids and we all loved it.  From the time the movie started, nobody moved.  It was great!
Title: The Littlest Light on the Christmas Tree

reviewText: Not great or original, the part I like best of this movie is the digital generated images, very well done..the tale is not very interesting, kids may like it, not sure,.may not be a holiday classic, but was good.
Title: The Littlest Light on the Christmas Tree

reviewText: The story was good except they kept saying you have to believe but didn't say in what you must believe.  Being a Christmas story, I would assume you must believe in Jesus because that is the reason for the season. Right?
Title: The Littlest Light on the Christmas Tree

reviewText: I purchased this for my 5 year old who loves Christmas stories. The story itself is really interesting and cute, but the animation is atrocious. Creepy looking adults and they move strangely; it's like someone animated this for a school project. I know teenagers who can animate better than this.
Title: The Littlest Light on the Christmas Tree

reviewText: The movie arrived in a timely manner and about the time we expected it. The animation was very interesting, not as good as the cover leads you to believe, but interesting to watch. Adorable story.
Title: The Littlest Light on the Christmas Tree

reviewText: This is a very sweet movie..great music too.  My 3 year old watches it several time over the holiday season.
summary: My 3 year old LOVES this movie
Title: The Littlest Light on the Christmas Tree
